text: First time client. Contacted CMY around 5 pm for urgent assistance. My husband had pulled out his NGT feeding tube. Wilbur was able to arrange the nurse to come within 1.5 hours. Tube inserted competently by Nurse Siti. She put everyone at ease. Very reassuring .  My husband was able to continue with his feed without delay. Thank you CMY.

Called at 915pm and requested for a home visit for our ill grandfather. Dr Lau came within 45min-1h. He was clear with his diagnosis and advice. Will look for him again if his services are needed. We really appreciate it, keep up the good work!

My Mom was in the advanced stage of dementia during her final days. She  passed away on 19th Dec 2021. My family engaged CMY and in particular,  Dr Lau, to attend to my Mom. I find Dr Lau to be a very dedicated and detailed doctor. He will share with us his detailed diagnosis and provide us with our options. If there is any problems with Mom, he is just a call away and will rush down if urgent. He even answered our call at 3am when Mom was having  some problems. I deeply appreciate the help of Dr Lau and his nursing team and would like to compliment them.

Dr Lau and his team of nurses provide good care and dedicated medical service to my dad and mum. They are professional and always available to assist family members. We are privileged to have them to take care of my parentsâ€™ needs.
